categoryDescription: Create a mobile app incredibly fast, without coding. Learn how to drag and drop UI (user interface) elements into an app, integrate your app with backend data, and secure your app with an authentication mechanism.

categoryTours.title: 1. Import & Launch a Native App
categoryTours.description: Open a native mobile app and preview it on your mobile device.
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside HCL Volt MX Iris that guides you through step-by-step process of each module. You can access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hike icon in the Iris toolbar:

 

Learn how to:

- Import a simple three-form app

- Run and launch the app on Iris App Viewer

categoryTours.title: 2. Create UI from Collections
categoryTours.description: Create user interface with Visualizer drag-and-drop elements for an app.
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony Hike. A Hike is an interactive tour in Kony Visualizer that guides you through a step-by-step process of each module. You can access the Hikes catalog by clicking the Hikes icon in the Visualizer toolbar.

 

Learn how to:

- Create forms

- Add User Interface collections to forms

- Create action sequences and add navigation between forms

categoryTours.title: 3. Connect the App UI to Data
categoryTours.description: Connect the employee list form (frmList) to the EmployeeServices service.
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony Hike. A Hike is an interactive tour in Kony Visualizer that guides you through a step-by-step process of each module. You can access the Hikes catalog by clicking the Hikes icon in the Visualizer toolbar.

 

Learn how to:

- Drag and drop sample services from the Data panel

- Map database objects to the UI elements of the app

categoryTours.title: 4. Add Login Service
categoryTours.description: Help secure an app’s data with a user authentication mechanism.
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony Hike. A Hike is an interactive tour in Kony Visualizer that guides you through a step-by-step process of each module. You can access the Hikes catalog by clicking the Hikes icon in the Visualizer toolbar.

 

Learn how to:

- Add an authentication service to a login form by using an existing Identity Service

- Create an action sequence to limit access to the app

categoryTours.title: 5. Add a Details Form
categoryTours.description: Add a third form to the app and change the form's parameters.
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony Hike. A Hike is an interactive tour in Kony Visualizer that guides you through a step-by-step process of each module. You can access the Hikes catalog by clicking the Hikes icon in the Visualizer toolbar.

 

Learn how to:

- Map database objects to  UI elements of the app

- Create action sequences for Logout buttons

categoryTours.title: 6. Publish and Share the App
categoryTours.description: Use Visualizer App Viewer to preview the EmployeeDir (Native) app on a mobile device.
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony Hike. A Hike is an interactive tour in Kony Visualizer that guides you through a step-by-step process of each module. You can access the Hikes catalog by clicking the Hikes icon in the Visualizer toolbar.

 

Learn how to:

- Publish and share the app by using Visualizer App Viewer

categoryTours.title: 7. Publish App to Enterprise Store
categoryTours.description: Learn how to publish an app to an Enterprise App store.
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside Kony Visualizer that walks you through every step of the module.

Access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hikes icon in Visualizer toolbar:

 

Learn how to:

- Publish an app to an Enterprise App store

- Share the published app through the Enterprise App store

categoryDescription: Create a Responsive Web app—a web app that looks and performs perfectly on any device—without coding. Take these hikes to learn how to create Web app user interface, integrate the web app with backend data, set responsivity parameters, and secure the app with an authentication mechanism.

categoryTours.title: 1. Import and Launch a Web App
categoryTours.description: Open and run a Responsive Web app.
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony Hike. A Hike is an interactive tour in Kony Visualizer that guides you through a step-by-step process of each module. You can access the Hikes catalog by clicking the Hikes icon in the Visualizer toolbar.

 

Learn how to:

- Import a simple two-form app

- Run and launch the app on your computer by using Visualizer Preview

categoryTours.title: 2. Create UI from Collections
categoryTours.description: Create user interface with Visualizer drag-and-drop elements for an app.
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony Hike. A Hike is an interactive tour in Kony Visualizer that guides you through a step-by-step process of each module. You can access the Hikes catalog by clicking the Hikes icon in the Visualizer toolbar.

 

Learn how to:

- Create forms

- Add UI collections to forms

- Create action sequences and add navigation between forms

categoryTours.title: 3. Connect the App UI to Data
categoryTours.description: Connect the employee list form (frmEmployee) to the EmployeeServices service.
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony Hike. A Hike is an interactive tour in Kony Visualizer that guides you through a step-by-step process of each module. You can access the Hikes catalog by clicking the Hikes icon in the Visualizer toolbar.

 

Learn how to:

- Drag and drop sample services from the Data panel

- Map database objects to the UI elements of the app

categoryTours.title: 4. Add Login Service
categoryTours.description: Secure an app’s data with a user authentication mechanism.
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony Hike. A Hike is an interactive tour in Kony Visualizer that guides you through a step-by-step process of each module. You can access the Hikes catalog by clicking the Hikes icon in the Visualizer toolbar.

 

Learn how to:

- Add an authentication service to a login form by using an existing Identity Service

- Create an action sequence to limit access to the app

categoryTours.title: 5. Add a Details Form
categoryTours.description: Add more functionality to the frmEmployee form.
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony Hike. A Hike is an interactive tour in Kony Visualizer that guides you through a step-by-step process of each module. You can access the Hikes catalog by clicking the Hikes icon in the Visualizer toolbar.

 

Learn how to:

- Map database objects with User Interface elements

- Create action sequences for Logout buttons

categoryTours.title: 6. Responsive Web - 1
categoryTours.description: Make your web app responsive by using breakpoints.
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony Hike. A Hike is an interactive tour in Kony Visualizer that guides you through a step-by-step process of each module. You can access the Hikes catalog by clicking the Hikes icon in the Visualizer toolbar.

 

Learn how to:

- Define three breakpoints for the Login form (frmLogin)

- Optimize the layout for one breakpoint for the form

- Run and Live Preview the app

categoryTours.title: 7. Responsive Web - 2
categoryTours.description: Design UI for each breakpoint. Make your app suitable for every type of device.
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony Hike. A Hike is an interactive tour in Kony Visualizer that guides you through a step-by-step process of each module. You can access the Hikes catalog by clicking the Hikes icon in the Visualizer toolbar.

 

Learn how to:

- Define three breakpoints for the Employee form (frmEmployee)

- Optimize the layout for all breakpoints for the form

- Run and Live Preview the app

categoryName: Build Low-code Apps with Reusable Components
categoryDescription: Explore pre-built software components from Kony Marketplace. Learn how to import, set up, and link various components to build low-code apps.

categoryTours.title: Introduction to Mobile Components
categoryTours.description: Import and customize a component (Range Slider) for Mobile.
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony Hike. A Hike is an interactive tour in Kony Visualizer that guides you through a step-by-step process of each module. You can access the Hikes catalog by clicking the Hikes icon in the Visualizer toolbar.

 

Learn how to:

- Import and add the Range Slider component to your app

- Set up the component for the mobile channel

- Preview the app on your mobile
category: Build Low-code Apps with Reusable Components

categoryTours.title: Introduction to Web Components
categoryTours.description: Import and customize a component (Range Slider) for Web.
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony Hike. A Hike is an interactive tour in Kony Visualizer that guides you through a step-by-step process of each module. You can access the Hikes catalog by clicking the Hikes icon in the Visualizer toolbar.

 

Learn how to:

- Import and add the Range Slider component to your app

- Set up the component for the web channel

- Preview the app on your computer
category: Build Low-code Apps with Reusable Components

categoryTours.title: Link Two Components
categoryTours.description: Import and link two components using actions.
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony Hike. A Hike is an interactive tour in Kony Visualizer that guides you through a step-by-step process of each module. You can access the Hikes catalog by clicking the Hikes icon in the Visualizer toolbar.

 

Learn how to:

- Import and add the List with Sample Data component to your app

- Set up the component for the mobile channel

- Add an action to filter the list by using Range Slider

- Preview the app on your mobile
category: Build Low-code Apps with Reusable Components

categoryTours.title: Build an App Using Components
categoryTours.description: Import and link components to build a CRM app.
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony Hike. A Hike is an interactive tour in Kony Visualizer that guides you through a step-by-step process of each module. You can access the Hikes catalog by clicking the Hikes icon in the Visualizer toolbar.

 

Learn how to: 

- Import and add the following components to your app:

    - Login – Active Directory

    - List and Details – Salesforce

- Add an action to navigate between forms

- Preview the app on your mobile
category: Build Low-code Apps with Reusable Components

categoryTours.title: Add Features Using Components
categoryTours.description: Import a component to an app to add new features.
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony Hike. A Hike is an interactive tour in Kony Visualizer that guides you through a step-by-step process of each module. You can access the Hikes catalog by clicking the Hikes icon in the Visualizer toolbar.

 

Learn how to:

- Import and add the Hamburger Menu component to your app

- Add an action to map the menu with the list of employees

- Preview the app on your mobile
category: Build Low-code Apps with Reusable Components

categoryDescription: Explore HCL Volt MX Iris’s simplified user interface while you build low-code and cross-channel apps. Learn about different layouts and application types that you can build.

categoryTours.title: Kony Quantum Orientation
categoryTours.description: Learn about the Kony Quantum features.
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony Hike. A Hike is an interactive tour in Kony Visualizer that guides you through a step-by-step process of each module. You can access the Hikes catalog by clicking the Hikes icon in the Visualizer toolbar.


Get a brief understanding of the Kony Quantum features and their functionality.

categoryTours.title: Introduction to Flex Layout
categoryTours.description: Learn about Flex layout properties.
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony Hike. A Hike is an interactive tour in Kony Visualizer that guides you through a step-by-step process of each module. You can access the Hikes catalog by clicking the Hikes icon in the Visualizer toolbar.

 

For a FlexContainer, learn how to:

 

- Define widget arrangement

- Modify free form attributes

- Add logo and header widgets

categoryTours.title: Flex Layout Properties
categoryTours.description: Manage flex layout using properties.
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony Hike. A Hike is an interactive tour in Kony Visualizer that guides you through a step-by-step process of each module. You can access the Hikes catalog by clicking the Hikes icon in the Visualizer toolbar.

 

Learn how to:

- Set properties to a Button widget

- Align a button across the X and Y axis

- Explore the zIndex property

categoryTours.title: Introduction to Segment
categoryTours.description: Learn the basics of the Segment widget
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony Hike. A Hike is an interactive tour in Kony Visualizer that guides you through a step-by-step process of each module. You can access the Hikes catalog by clicking the Hikes icon in the Visualizer toolbar.

Learn how to:

  • Create a FlexForm with a Segment widget
  • Add widgets to a Segment widget
  • Assign sample data to a Segment widget

categoryTours.title: Assign Data to Segment
categoryTours.description: Learn how to assign data to a Segment widget
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony Hike. A Hike is an interactive tour in Kony Visualizer that guides you through a step-by-step process of each module. You can access the Hikes catalog by clicking the Hikes icon in the Visualizer toolbar.
Learn how to:

  • Change the UI and add new widgets to a Segment widget
  • Bind back-end services to the UI elements in a Segment

categoryTours.title: Introduction to Segment Templates
categoryTours.description: Know more about using Segment templates
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony Hike. A Hike is an interactive tour in Kony Visualizer that guides you through a step-by-step process of each module. You can access the Hikes catalog by clicking the Hikes icon in the Visualizer toolbar.

Learn how to:

  • Convert a row in a Segment into a template.
  • Add sample data to widgets in a Segment

categoryTours.title: Introduction to Action Editor
categoryTours.description: Learn how to use Action Editor
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony Hike. A Hike is an interactive tour in Kony Visualizer that guides you through a step-by-step process of each module. You can access the Hikes catalog by clicking the Hikes icon in the Visualizer toolbar.

Learn how to:

Using the Action Editor,

  • Navigate between forms
  • Set if, else conditions
  • Show an alert
  • Set widget properties

categoryTours.title: Creating a Component
categoryTours.description: Learn about how to create a component
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony Hike. A Hike is an interactive tour in Kony Visualizer that guides you through a step-by-step process of each module. You can access the Hikes catalog by clicking the Hikes icon in the Visualizer toolbar.

Learn how to:

  • Create a login form
  • Create a layout for the component
  • Add data validations to widgets
  • Add the component to the login form

categoryTours.title: Understand App Channels
categoryTours.description: Explore a sample app designed for various application channels.
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony Hike. A Hike is an interactive tour in Kony Visualizer that guides you through a step-by-step process of each module. You can access the Hikes catalog by clicking the Hikes icon in the Visualizer toolbar.

 

Learn about the following channels:

- Mobile

- Tablet

- Desktop

- Wearables

categoryTours.title: Introduction to Kony JavaScript
categoryTours.description: Understanding the basics of Kony JavaScript.
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony Hike. A Hike is an interactive tour in Kony Visualizer that guides you through a step-by-step process of each module. You can access the Hikes catalog by clicking the Hikes icon in the Visualizer toolbar.

 

Learn how to:

- Use JavaScript to create a login form

- Get insights on the validate and onNavigate functions

categoryTours.title: Introduction to Internationalization
categoryTours.description: Learn the basics of Internationalization(i18n).
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony Hike. A Hike is an interactive tour in Kony Visualizer that guides you through a step-by-step process of each module. You can access the Hikes catalog by clicking the Hikes icon in the Visualizer toolbar.

Learn how to:

  • Configure an app for different locales
  • View the locale changes for the app on a device

categoryTours.title: Internationalization with Layout
categoryTours.description: Learn the basics of Internationalization(i18n) with layout configuration changes.
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony Hike. A Hike is an interactive tour in Kony Visualizer that guides you through a step-by-step process of each module. You can access the Hikes catalog by clicking the Hikes icon in the Visualizer toolbar.

Learn how to:

  • Configure an app for different locales
  • View the locale and layout changes for the app on a device

categoryDescription: Get to know the different services that you can connect with your front end. The services include: Identity Services, Integration Services, and Orchestration services.

categoryTours.title: Understand Identity Services
categoryTours.description: Add authentication to your app.
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony Hike. A Hike is an interactive tour in Kony Visualizer that guides you through a step-by-step process of each module. You can access the Hikes catalog by clicking the Hikes icon in the Visualizer toolbar.

 

Learn how to secure your application by using an authentication mechanism.

categoryTours.title: Add a Salesforce Service
categoryTours.description: Add a Salesforce service to your app.
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony Hike. A Hike is an interactive tour in Kony Visualizer that guides you through a step-by-step process of each module. You can access the Hikes catalog by clicking the Hikes icon in the Visualizer toolbar.

 

Configure a service that communicates with an external data source by using a Salesforce data connector.

categoryTours.title: Add an Authentication Source
categoryTours.description: Add Kony User Repository to your app to authorize users.
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony Hike. A Hike is an interactive tour in Kony Visualizer that guides you through a step-by-step process of each module. You can access the Hikes catalog by clicking the Hikes icon in the Visualizer toolbar.
Learn how to:

  • Add Kony User Repository as an authentication source
  • Add users to the repository
  • Access app using the login credentials from the Kony User Repository

categoryTours.title: Use Sample Services
categoryTours.description: Connect a sample back-end database to a form.
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside Kony Visualizer that guides you through step-by-step process of each module. You can access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hike icon in the Visualizer toolbar.

Learn how to:

  • Create a form
  • Connect to a sample back-end database
  • Add data to the form. You can follow the same steps to bind your own back-end data to your app.

categoryTours.title: Use Storage Service
categoryTours.description: Create a storage service, populate and connect the data to the form.
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside Kony Visualizer that guides you through step-by-step process of each module. You can access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hike icon in the Visualizer toolbar.

Learn how to:

  • Create a form
  • Create a storage service
  • Populate data in the storage service
  • Connect data to the form.

categoryTours.title: Introduction to NFIs
categoryTours.description: Use NFIs to access OS specific functionality, specifically, Android Device Settings.
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside Kony Visualizer that guides you through step-by-step process of each module. You can access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hike icon in the Visualizer toolbar. 

Learn how to:

  • Configure the Android Native Function APIs required to access Device settings on Android device from an app using Kony.
  • Add code in the Form controller to access Device Settings

categoryTours.title: NFIs Using Thrid-party Library
categoryTours.description: Use NFIs to access third-party libraries, specifically, Android barcode scanner.
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside Kony Visualizer that guides you through step-by-step process of each module. You can access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hike icon in the Visualizer toolbar. 

Learn how to:

  • Learn how to import a Collection library to an app and use it in a form.
  • Configure the Native Function APIs required for barcode scanner for an Android app.
  • Add code in the Form controller for the barcode scanning functionality.

categoryDescription: Create a banking app incredibly fast, without coding. Learn how to drag and drop UI (user interface) elements into an app, integrate your app with backend data, and secure your app with an authentication mechanism.

categoryTours.title: Mobile Native App
categoryTours.description: Create a sample Banking Mobile Native app using Kony Quantum.
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside Kony Visualizer that guides you through step-by-step process of each module. You can access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hike icon in the Visualizer toolbar. 

For the Native Mobile channel, learn how to:

  • Create forms with UI elements for user interaction.
  • Add navigation to access different forms of the application.
  • Preview it on your mobile.

categoryTours.title: Responsive Web App
categoryTours.description: Create a sample Banking Responsive web app using Kony Quantum.
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside Kony Visualizer that guides you through step-by-step process of each module. You can access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hike icon in the Visualizer toolbar. 


For the Responsive Web/Desktop web channel, learn how to:
•    Create forms with UI elements for user interaction.
•    Add navigation to access different forms of the application.
•    Preview it on your mobile.

categoryTours.title: Services - Mobile Native
categoryTours.description: Leverage back-end services for a Banking Mobile Native app using Kony Quantum.
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside Kony Visualizer that guides you through step-by-step process of each module. You can access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hike icon in the Visualizer toolbar.

For the Native Mobile channel, learn how to:

  • Integrate data sources by using data services
  • Integrate the services with the UI elements of the application
  • Create actions using Action Editor

categoryTours.title: Services - Responsive Web
categoryTours.description: Leverage back-end services for the a sample Banking Responsive web app using Kony Quantum.
categoryTours.details:
This learning module is a Kony HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside Kony Visualizer that guides you through step-by-step process of each module. You can access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hike icon in the Visualizer toolbar.

For the Responsive Web/Desktop web channel, learn how to:

  • Integrate data sources by using data services
  • Integrate the services with the UI elements of the application
  • Create actions using Action Editor
